title: Til Death Do Us Part
description:
Today you are cordially invited to a dead wedding. These are stories about brides and grooms, and what goes wrong when you love someone to death. First, Sapphire shares her modern take on the urban legend of the missing bride. Then, she tells  the origins of La Sayona, escapes an entity at Bride’s Pool, and picks up a hitchhiker in Venezuela.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:author: Studio71
